description:
the Ronson 45 is the only pistol manufactured by <info>Ronson</info.
One of the most <good>powerful</good> commercially available hand guns. What it lacks in its relatively <bad>small clip size</bad> it makes up for in sheer stopping power
it has multiple blue panels on top of a black build.

This weapon is <good>decent</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
